sentence.Network_en: Trionyx sinensis virus ( TSV ) was isolated from the lethal disease Chinese soft - shelled turtle.
sentence.Network_cn: 中华鳖病毒 ( TSV ) 是从病鳖中分离到的一种病毒病原.

sentence.Network_en: It can provide reliable basis for artificial culture of Trionyx sinensis, the improvement of incubation rate.
sentence.Network_cn: 介绍了生态因子对中华鳖孵化率的影响,为开展中华鳖的人工繁殖, 提高孵化率,提供了科学依据.

sentence.Network_en: Objective: To analyse the fatty acid and trace element composition and antioxidant capacity of Trionyx sinensis.
sentence.Network_cn: 摘要: 目的研究甲鱼脂肪酸和微量元素组成及含量特点,揭示其抗氧化作用效果.

PerfectNetExp.abs: A NEW FOSSIL TRIONYX FROM FUCHIEN福建新发现的鳖类化石
